page.title: 03ACTIVITIES:CHERRY WILLINGHAM
page.content: In Cherry Willingham there is a range of entertainment from bowls to football to disco's. At the village hall there are disco's at least once a month; dancing is therefore important to the life of the community. There is a school of dancing where pupils from 3yrs. to 19yrs. in the village hall with most lessons in the evenings. Sport also plays an important role in the spare time of people from this area. Football, tennis, netball, bowls cricket and many other games are provided for in the villages. The area has a Youth Club where people from 13yrs. to 18yrs. can go and play indoor games and enjoy themselves. Youth clubs not only entertain the youths, they also keep them out of trouble. B. DRAPER
